reviewText: Mature mature mature I can't say that enough I love it but its a adult!!! Anima

If you are looking for action, love, sadness, joy, rage, revenge, peace, war and all the emotions experienced by man or demon, this is the movie for you. You will not find a story anywhere as complicated and creative as this anywhere. I consider this a legendary film, with a story that can be told for generations to come. This movie is the best in the series.

The DVD5 has many blocking and video compression artifacts - it's absolutely horrible. Don't waste your money. When the source is this bad, no amount of correction will fix it. There is also a DVD9 that while not perfect, it's much better than this piece of trash.
